msbt.message: Heya, ! Surprised?You said you wanted me to move hereso here I am! A bona fide resident like you, ! ButI still have a lot of unpacking to do. Can you come back tomorrow? This place'll be shipshape by then!

Well, if it ain't ! It's me—!I wanna thank you. After all, you're the one who convinced me to move here. And I'm sure glad you did! Just now I'm scramblin' to get my house in order before I can go take in all the sights.

Howdy, .Welcome to my new abode! Eh Apologies for the mess.I'd tell you to make yourself at home, but it looks like my home was hit by a movin' truck. Gahaha! Not to worry, I'll get her straightened up in no time, !

Heya, ! I've been hopin' I'd get a chance to thank you!When you visited , you told me it was high time I try puttin' down roots in a new place. So, the very next day, I took the plunge! Moved right here to . I'm pleased as punch to be an honest-to-goodness citizen! So, thanks. See ya around.

Hey! It's me! Remember?Don't tell me you forgot asking me to move here! Humph! And I thought I had a foggy memory, . Well, at any rate, you won't be able to forget now that I took your advice. Gahaha!

Well, if it ain't !So kiddo, I did like you asked I up and moved to your island!And boy, a fella could get used to this! I could see puttin' down roots here on . Butseein' how I'm new and all, I hope you won't mind if I lean on you now and again, .

There you are! I was just startin' to worry you might be avoidin' me.Been hopin' to catch up, since it was your invite that made me decide to pick up and move here to begin with. Great seein' you again, .

Buhahhahhh <10_10 />WAHCHOOO!!!<10_9 />Ugh H-heya, . It's me.Remember? You invited me here? ACHOOO! Sorry, kiddo.I run into you again and I'm sick. Of all the rotten luck, .When I'm feelin' better, we should get together and hang owow<10_10 />AHHCHOOOWT!

! As I live and breathe! Can't believe I ran into you my first day on . Good ol' invited me to move here. Kept going on and on about how great it was. I wasn't so sure But, at my age, you gotta shake things up now and again. So, here I am! See ya around!

! Surprised to see me? Well, I have some good news! This isn't just any ol' visit. asked me to move to a while back. Was real pushy about it too! I don't usually go in for peer pressure. Buthere I am! Gahaha!Anyway, starting today, I'm officially a resident of ! So, I'll be seein' ya around.

Hey, . I've got some good news. Turns out I moved here! invited me. They gave this place a real glowing recommendation. So, here I am. Now, I just hope this place lives up to its reputation. No pressure, though. Gahaha!

Good to see ya, . First time I've run into you since I decided to move here. Boy, that they really put the screws to me. Insisted I move here. So, I decided to turn over a new leaf. I mean, seems real nice. Why not put down roots? Anyhow, I guess that means you'll be seein' a lot more of my mug. Consider yourself warned. Gahaha!

Oh! ! Good to see ya! It's me, . From . sang this place's praises. Practically begged me to move here. So I came on over just so I could see what all the fuss was about!Wish we coulda caught up sooner. But we're neighbors now, so I'll be seein' ya around plenty!

Ahahhahhh <10_10 />AHHH-CHOOOIE!!!<10_9 />Heya, . Real sorry 'bout that I'm not f-feelin' so hot. invited me to move here, and first thing I did was catch this crud. Hate that you came all that way just to see me like this. How about a rain chuhahhAHH-CHECK?! Urrgh

! Boy, am I happy to see you! Didja hear? I up and moved here to . Thing is, someone from around here invited mewhich is why I'm here. But thenthey up and moved away! Can you believe it?! Puts me in a real bind.Well, at any rate, thank the stars you live here. Makes me feel a whole lot better about my predicament.

Heya, ! You live here on too? It's the darndest thing. A while back, someone from around here said I should move to . They were real passionate about what a "special" place it was. I took 'em at their word andhere I am. Thing is, they up and skedaddled before I got here! So much for a welcome wagon, Anyway, long story short, I live here on now. Glad I'll get to see you around!

This is the w-worst. Ohhey, . Didn't know you lived here too.AhahhahhhAHHCHOOO! I just moved here, and boy howdy I'm havin' a run of bad luck. For starters, I moved here after gettin' the hard sell from a certain someone from this island. Then when I got here, I found out that certain someone had up and moved away. And now I have thisahahh AHHCHOOOcold. Can't say this was the fresh start I was hopin' for. On the upside, I'm finally seein' a familiar face. So I got that goin' for me. Hope to see more of you.

Heya, . Guess what! I've moved back here to good ol' ! It's been a while since we had a chance to catch up. I can't wait to get together and swap stories! I've still got a lot of unpackin' to do. But come tomorrow, I'll be ready for company, .

Well, well! Look who it is! My ol' pal, . Hope ya haven't forgotten me. I heard the other day, and it made me miss this place somethin' fierce. So, you know what I did? I picked up my things and moved back here to . Just like that! Anyhow, can't wait to get to jawin' with youjust like back in the day.

Ahahhahhh <10_10 />AHHHCHOOOIEE!!! <10_9 />Ugh. Pardon me. It's been a while, . Not sure if you remember me. The name's . I moved back to a little while ago. Unfortunately, a cold up and moved in with me. I'd hate to pass it on to you, kiddo. Best steer clear of me. We'll catch up when I'm on the mend.
Eh! Is that you, ?Well now, I didn't know you lived here. I just moved here today, myself! Feels like it was meant to be, eh? Lookin' forward to seein' ya around, !
If it isn't ! I didn't know you lived here.Talk about a happy coincidence. Just moved to a couple days ago myself! Hope to see ya around, friend. I meanneighbor. Better yet friendly neighbor! Gahaha!

Well, well. There you are! You ain't gonna believe thisI just up and moved here! To this island, .When I went by Resident Services and they said you lived here too, I just knew I'd hit the jackpot! Can't wait to catch up with you! Don't be a stranger, kiddo.

As I live and breathe! The one and only ! Guess the rumors are true, then We're neighbors! Gahaha!Just moved here myself. Couldn't believe my luck when I heard you were livin' here.Destiny. Kismet. Fate. Call it what you like. It'll be real nice seein' you around, !

Babahbahhh <10_10 />BAH-CHOOOIEE!!! <10_9 />Blast this cold! Wait a secwhat are you doin' here, kiddo?<10_4 /> Oh, that's right, I heard you live here too. My head feels like it's jammed full of wet cotton thanks to this crud. Can't think straight to save my life. Thing is, I just moved here from . And I'd love to catch up with yousnuffle BAH-chooo! But maybe come back sniffleanother time? Let's chat after I shake this plague.

Heya, ! Surprised?You said you wanted me to move hereso here I am! A bona fide resident like you, ! ButI still have a lot of unpacking to do. Can you come back tomorrow? This place'll be shipshape by then!
Look who it is—! It's me, !You were the one who inspired me to move myself here, remember? Back on the old island, ?I can't wait to catch up with you as soon as I manage to finish settlin' in!

Howdy, .Welcome to my new abode! Eh Apologies for the mess.I'd tell you to make yourself at home, but it looks like my home was hit by a movin' truck. Gahaha! Not to worry, I'll get her straightened up in no time, !
Oh, heya, !Thanks for invitin' me to this island, back when I was on that other island. I'm real glad I moved, ! I'm a citizen of now, just like you!
Remember me? ? The one you invited to move here from that other island, ?Either way, glad we met up again!

Well, if it ain't !Look at you. How you been doin'? I took you up on your invite to move here to your island, . seems like a real nice place so far.I'm happy to be here, and I'm glad we ran into each other again.

Well, hey there, you! So this is where you've been livin' all this time!I took you up on your invite back on that other island and moved myself here to this one, . It's great to meet you here again. Hope to be seein' a lot of you now!

Buhahhahhh <10_10 />WAHCHOOO!!!<10_9 />Ugh H-heya, . It's me.Remember? You invited me here? ACHOOO! Sorry, kiddo.I run into you again and I'm sick. Of all the rotten luck, .When I'm feelin' better, we should get together and hang owow<10_10 />AHHCHOOOWT!

Heya, ! Surprised?You said you wanted me to move hereso here I am! A bona fide resident like you, ! ButI still have a lot of unpacking to do. Can you come back tomorrow? This place'll be shipshape by then!

Thought I recognized a familiar face! Good to see you, ! It's me, !I followed your advice back at the old campsite and moved to this island.I gotta finish unpackin' my stuff just now, but I'm real glad we're gonna be neighbors again, !

Howdy, .Welcome to my new abode! Eh Apologies for the mess.I'd tell you to make yourself at home, but it looks like my home was hit by a movin' truck. Gahaha! Not to worry, I'll get her straightened up in no time, !

Well, hey there, !Thanks for invitin' me here back at our old campsite! I packed myself up and moved right over, !Reckon I couldn't wait to become the newest resident! Thanks again for inspirin' my move.

Well, there you are! It's me—your old pal !I moved here as soon as I could! You, uh, do remember invitin' me here back at our campsite, right? Well, either waylookin' forward to bein' neighbors again, !
Well, if it ain't !<10_4 /> How you been doin'?You invited me back at our campsite, and you better believe I took you up on that, ! I'm real grateful to be here with you. 's great so far!
Hey there! So this is where you've been all this time, !You invited me to this island back at our campsite, so I took you up on it.Glad we ran into each other again, and thanks again for invitin' me.

Bwuh Bwah <10_10 />BWAAAACHOOOOEE!<10_9 />Ugh H-heya, It's m-me, !I moved here to the island after you invited me to back at the campsite.Of all the rotten luck, you caught up with me while I'm sick, . Don't that beat all? Soon as I'm feelin' better, we should try an' hang owow <10_10 />AAAAACHOOOGIE!

Didn't expect to run into you just after arrivin', !Back at the campsite, told me I should move here. So I did! Maybe a hasty decision, lookin' back on it, but your bein' here sure makes me feel better about it, .
Gahaha! Surprised to see me here, ?Got talked into movin' here by , back at the campsite.Really talked this place up, what with the great neighbors you all are No pressure or nothin', .

Oh—hey there, !Guess it may seem a bit sudden, but we're neighbors here now. So, uh Surprise, ! I was campin' here when that character started in on me "You just gotta move to this place! Everyone's so great here!" So I did. Then I think, "What've I done?" Seein' you're here makes me think I made the right choice after all.

Remember me, ? It's me, !While I was stayin' at the campsite, I sorta got myself talked into movin' here by that . Looks like it was a good move, if you're the sorta neighbor I'm gonna have from now on, .

Well, hey there, ! It's me, !While I was campin' here a while ago, I got myself talked into movin' to the island to live by . Thought I'd made the rounds to meet everyone here, but I reckon I must've missed you somehow, . At any rate, I sure am glad that we're neighbors, and here's hopin' we see lots more of each other around here.

Buh <10_10 />BWAAA-CHOO!<10_9 /> Oh. Heya, .In case you hadn't heard, while I was campin' here I got talked into movin' to the island by . Maybe don't come too close— Ah-CHOO! I'm one sick .ACHOO! Maybe we can get together once I lick this cold, ?

Heya, ! Yeah, I'm livin' here now.Someone from the island talked me into it while I was campin' here, but they moved away before I moved in. Awkward way to start things out, so I'm sure glad to see a friendly face around here, . Might just hafta lean on you a bit, so thank you kindly in advance!

Look who it is—! You live here too, huh?So get thissome joker from this place talks me into movin' in while I'm here campin' on the island I pack up and move, only to find out that huckster up and moved away! Sure didn't see that one comin'. Anyway, at least I ran into you again. Maybe my luck's turnin' around here. A guy can only hope,

Urgh, my achin' bones Oh! Heya, .Didn't know you lived here too. That'sACHOO!<10_4 /> Sorry, bad cold.I had a local talk me into movin' in while I was campin' here, but they moved away before I got back. And now I'm sick. Ugh, I just can't seem to catch a break, .Although seein' your face again is a real pick-me-up. ACHOO!

There you are, !You said I should move to the island, so that's what I did, !Reckon it was kinda life changin' to visit 's campsite.So now that we're neighbors, maybe I should start borrowin' your stuff

Well, look who finally decided to show up!Didja forget chattin' to me back at the campsite? Askin' me to move in?Ah, I'm just messin' with you, kiddo!But now that I am here, I'm hopin' I can lean on my good island buddy while I'm settlin' in, .

There you are, !You kinda caught me in the middle of settlin' in here with all my junkI'm really grateful you talked me into movin' in here, back at the campsite. This is gonna be fun, ! But can we maybe chat more once I'm just a tad more situated?
Well, hey there, !I wanna thank you for encouragin' me while I was at the campsite.Meant enough that I took your advice and moved in here, !Can you believe you and I are neighbors?

Howdy do, !How's this the first time we're runnin' into each other here?Much obliged for the encouragement you gave me to move here back at the campsite, .You really did me a solid! Thanks a bunchneighbor!

! How've you been, ?You, uh, you do remember invitin' me to move here, don'tcha? Back when I was stayin' at the campsite? I took your advice, packed up my stuff, and moved here just as soon as I could after your pep talk! Sure am proud we're neighbors now.

Heya! It's me, !And I'm not just visitin' this time. I'm a bona fide resident now!You were right back at the campsite, when you said I just HAD to move in.This place is pretty great so far! Now that we're neighbors, hope to see a lot more of you, .

Look who it is! Remember me, from back at the campsite? ?Sure you do! You— YAH-CHOO!This head cold's got me all woolly- headed. Been meanin' to thank you for convincin' me to move here. Let's catch up once my fever breaks and I'm on the mend, . ACHOO! Consarn it, anyway!
Heya, ! It's me, !Remember? From the campsite? That's when I got invited to move here by . I sure am glad to be back here on to stay!Be seein' you around, .

Howdy, !Hey, I just wanna tell you how much I appreciated your neighborliness back when I stayed at the campsite.You and made me feel real welcome here.That's why I packed up all this junk and moved myself to your island.Once I'm a bit less discombobulated, we should catch up, !

Yo, ! It's me, !Haven't seen yousince back when I was stayin' at the local campsite!Yeah that was when invited me to move in here. Well, now that we're livin' on the same island, I hope we'll see lots more of each other, .
!Reckon I ain't seen yousince back at the campsite! How you been?Did you know that invited me to move here? Anyways, I'm glad I did. This place ain't half bad, .See you around the island, I guess

Well, hey, !I ain't seen you since back when I was stayin' at the campsite!That's when I got my arm twisted to move here by That worked out swell for yours truly! Sure is nifty that we can run into each other more now, .

Oh! Uh, , right?<10_4 /> It's me. ?I think we met back at the— ACHOO! Sorry, at the campsiteThat's when I got my arm twisted to move here by that character, Love to c-catch up, but you may wanna keep your distance while I'm sufferin' from this c-cold

Heya, ! Didja know I live here now?Some local yokel just insisted I had to move in while I was here stayin' at the island's campsite. So I do just that, and come to find out that joker's up and moved away.Joke's on that character, 'cause it turns out I like this place. Your livin' here is a big plus, Here's hopin' we see lots more of each other round the old island!

Well, if it ain't !Dunno if you heard, but I got invited to move here back when I was stayin' at the campsite 'Course the joker that invited me up and moved away on me before I'd managed to move myself in. Guess in all the confusion, I sorta forgot you lived here, .Reckon things are lookin' up for me!

Urgh, my achin' bones Oh! Heya, .Didn't know you lived here too. That'sACHOO!<10_4 /> Sorry, bad cold.I had a local talk me into movin' in while I was campin' here, but they moved away before I got back. And now I'm sick. Ugh, I just can't seem to catch a break, .Although seein' your face again is a real pick-me-up. ACHOO!
